co.cask.coopr.provisioner.plugin

Class ResourceService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • co.cask.coopr.provisioner.plugin.ResourceService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

    public class ResourceService
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
    Service for managing plugin modules.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.State

    • Method Detail

      • createResourceBodyConsumer

        public co.cask.http.BodyConsumer createResourceBodyConsumer(Account account,
                                                   ResourceType resourceType,
                                                   String name,
                                                   co.cask.http.HttpResponder responder)
                                                     throws IOException
        Create a body consumer for streaming resource contents into the persistent store.
        Parameters:
        account - Account that is uploading the resource
        resourceType - Type of resource to upload
        name - Name of resource to upload
        responder - Responder for responding to the upload request
        Returns:
        BodyConsumer for consuming the resource contents and streaming them to the persistent store
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was an error getting the output stream for writing to the persistent store or writing the plugin metadata

      • numResources

        public int numResources(Account account)
                 throws IOException
        Get the number of all versions of all resources in the account. Resources can be in any state.
        Parameters:
        account - Account to get the number of resources for
        Returns:
        Number of resources in the account
        Throws:
        IOException

      • bootstrapResources

        public void bootstrapResources(Account account)
                        throws IOException
        Bootstrap an account's resources by copying what the superadmin has into the account.
        Parameters:
        account - Account to bootstrap
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getResourceInputStream

        public InputStream getResourceInputStream(Account account,
                                 ResourceType resourceType,
                                 String name,
                                 int version)
                                   throws MissingEntityException,
                                          IOException
        Get an input stream for reading the plugin resource.
        Parameters:
        account - Account the resource belongs to
        resourceType - Type of resource
        name - Name of resource to get an input stream for
        version - Version of resource to get an input stream for
        Returns:
        Input stream for reading the given plugin resource
        Throws:
        MissingEntityException - if there is no such resource version
        IOException - if there was an error getting the input stream for the resource

      • stage

        public void stage(Account account,
         ResourceType resourceType,
         String name,
         int version)
           throws MissingEntityException,
                  IOException
        Atomically stage the specified resource version for the given account and recall the previous staged version. A staged version will get pushed to provisioners during a sync, and will stay staged unless explicitly recalled.
        Parameters:
        account - Account that contains the resource
        resourceType - Type of resource to stage
        name - Name of resource to stage
        version - Version of resource to stage
        Throws:
        MissingEntityException - if there is no such resource version
        IOException - if there was an error staging the resource

      • recall

        public void recall(Account account,
          ResourceType resourceType,
          String name,
          int version)
            throws MissingEntityException,
                   IOException
        Recall the given resource for the given account. A no-op if there is no staged version.
        Parameters:
        account - Account that contains the resource
        resourceType - Type of resource to deactivate
        name - Name of the resource to deactivate
        version - Version of resource to stage
        Throws:
        MissingEntityException - if there is no such module
        IOException - if there was an error deactivating all versions of the module

      • getAll

        public Map<String,Set<ResourceMeta>> getAll(Account account,
                                   ResourceType resourceType,
                                   ResourceStatus status)
                                     throws IOException
        Get all resource metadata of the given type that belong to the given account that have the given status.
        Parameters:
        account - Account containing the resources
        resourceType - Type of resource to get
        status - Status of the resources to get. If null, resources of any status are returned.
        Returns:
        Immutable map of resource name to resource metadata
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was an error getting the resources

      • getAll

        public Set<ResourceMeta> getAll(Account account,
                       ResourceType resourceType,
                       String name,
                       ResourceStatus status)
                         throws IOException
        Get all metadata for versions of the given resource that have the given status.
        Parameters:
        account - Account containing the resource
        resourceType - Type of resource to get
        name - Name of the resource to get
        status - Status of the resources to get. If null, resources of any status are returned.
        Returns:
        Immutable set of metadata for versions of the given module
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was an error getting the module versions

      • delete

        public void delete(Account account,
          ResourceType resourceType,
          String name,
          int version)
            throws IllegalStateException,
                   IOException
        Delete the given resource. Can only be done if the resource is inactive.
        Parameters:
        account - Account containing the module
        resourceType - Type of resource to delete
        name - Name of resource to delete
        version - Version of resource to delete
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the resource is not in a deletable state
        IOException - if there was an error deleting the module version

      • delete

        public void delete(Account account,
          ResourceType resourceType,
          String name)
            throws IllegalStateException,
                   IOException
        Delete all versions of the given resource. Can only be done if all versions are inactive.
        Parameters:
        account - Account containing the module
        resourceType - Type of resource to delete
        name - Name of resource to delete
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not all the resources are in a deletable state
        IOException - if there was an error deleting the module version

      • getLiveResources

        public ResourceCollection getLiveResources(Account account)
                                    throws IOException
        Get the active resources for a given account.
        Parameters:
        account - Account to get active resources for
        Returns:
        Active resources for the given account
        Throws:
        IOException

        public ResourceCollection getResourcesToSync(Account account)
                                      throws IOException
        Get the resources that should be synced for a given account.
        Parameters:
        account - Account for which to get resources to sync
        Returns:
        Resources that should be synced for the given account
        Throws:
        IOException
